title: Pixel 2 The mail's arriving hours after they were sent, weather on screen wrong, nophone call record
content:
Pixel 2 acting funny.
Mail's arriving hours later
Phone call And WhatsApp and messages records showing much later
Bluetooth acts up, connects and disconnects on its own
Weather on screen is wrong, shows the correct one on clicking. 
Battery discharging much faster
Android 10 updated
